title: Store Information
body:
All our products come from nature and are therefore unique. Keeping that in mind, we will try to keep our web page up to date so that our customers can view all available parts. We provide true, accurate information about sizes and weights for you to choose your products of interest well. If you need different pictures, more detailed information, we will gladly send them via email.

### HOW TO BUY?



It is very easy to buy your products at Minas Cristais

Choose your products, click add to cart or buy button, it will be added to your cart.

After choosing all the products you want. Click on Cart at Checkout

Set shipping freight

Confirm your shipping details, check that all the details are correct, if any numbers or shipping data are missing, the return and reshipment will be charged to the customer, we are not responsible for incorrect information or missing data.

Choose the payment method and complete the purchase.

Your order will be packed for postage.



### COMO ACOMPANHAR O ANDAMENTO DO PEDIDO?

[Acompanhe aqui.](/app/#/account/orders)



### EXCHANGES AND RETURNS



All occurrences involving exchange or return must be communicated on this page with the subject EXCHANGE or RETURN and with the purchase data in the MESSAGE field.

The contact must be sent within 48 hours after receiving the products, exchanges or returns not communicated or communicated after the deadline will not be made.

The return must be made with the same packaging and care that the product was sent. If the product is returned without the necessary care and arrives damaged, the exchange or return will not be carried out.

IMPORTANT: Refuse to receive the products in case of damaged packaging or product in disagreement with the order.

If you still receive the product, please contact us within 48 hours.
